fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Build a trap at night.
- Set your built trap at another player's house at night. (Astral)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Traps can be torn down by selecting yourself at night.
- You may only have one Trap out at a time.
- If a player has a trap, their visitors will trigger it, and you will learn their name.
- When triggered, your trap will deal a Powerful Attack to one person who attacked your target (if any).
- When triggered, at most one attack against your target will be blocked by Powerful Defense.
